name: SaunaFinance
description: SAUNA FINANCE is a Defi platform on BSC (BEP20). It offers a variety of features such as decentralized exchange, liquidity provision opportunities, Farming, staking, lottery and NFT markets. SAUNA FINANCE aims to build various Dapps and create ideal sauna facilities to satisfy sauna users all over the world. By the votes of $ SAUNA (SAUNA FINANCE TOKEN) holders,we realize the best settings in every country / region, design of the facility ,sauna room temperature, water bath temperature, etc.,and create the most relaxed and happiest community.
